Package src

package src
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Board
    Represents the board in the game.
    BoardPanel
    The BoardPanel class represents a panel that displays the game board and handles rendering and updating of the squares.
    Currentsquers
    The Currentsquers class represents a collection of squares that are currently selected.
    Game
    Main game class that handles the game logic.
    Gui
    Main GUI class for the game.
    Piece
    The Piece class represents a game piece in a checkers game.
    Player
    The Player class represents a player in a game.
    Position
    The Position class represents a position on a two-dimensional grid.
    Square
    Represents a square on a checkers board.
    SquareState
    The SquareState class represents the state of a square in a checkers game.
